review: Excellent ortho who explains the problem and the solution before advising treatment. The clinic staff are very courteous. X-Ray and physiotherapy are provided at the same clinic for all patients. Highly recommended for all types of ortho related problems irrespective of age.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: First of all he gives time to explain about our issues, very patient very expressive about his explanations. And most impressive thing is he does not makes his patients scary. Very positive. I really felt happy to visit him for my elbow discomfort. Thanks for the positivity

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Ideal Doctor to consult. He is friendly and makes the patient comfortable. Listened to my complaints fully. Asked for further details, my other health issues and the drugs that I am taking. After examination and x-ray, explained the problem with a knee model. Prescribed drugs taking into consideration my other health problems. Minimum drugs. Prescription is very legible, in capital letters, with clear instructions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Thanks so much Doctor**** *** ********** *** ** *** **** ****** *** ****** * **** **** ****** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was very kind, friendly and cool to listen all my problems patiently. I went for my lower back pain. He patiently enquired about the sequences of pain and explained my problem clearly. Currently I’m following all his advises to cure my back pain and I am feeling better after following his instructions. Overall my consultation with him was very satisfied. I strongly recommend him for all Ortho related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The next gen doctor, i was suffering with this pain for years and consulted / treated by 3 other doctors before i met Dr. Shriram. The impression, the confidence and the attitude on the first consultation made me feel very comfortable.  He explained things in very detail, he spent the whole lot of time in listening to me, explaining to me and to my family members as well. The diagnosis and the way he explained the procedures made us feel confident. He was there with us right from the start till the rehab and even now. He is easily reachable and responsive, always just a text away. The procedure they did for me is a one of kind in a way. He ensured that im all good in all aspects. He does the follow ups, very transparent in his approach and most importantly IT IS WHAT IT IS. I am recovering well and would continue to recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Shriram is very polite and listen to the problem politely. His treatments are appreciable.  He explained about my mom's problem and took great care of her during surgery and post surgery.
